function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Pandemic outbreak of coronavirus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nearly unoccupied municipal buildings, elementary schools, and nursery schools","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The study involves analyzing energy consumption in buildings, which could be a potential indicator of building occupancy and human activity, both of which contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of basal eui","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Violation of lockdown measures leading to increased building occupancy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate reporting of building occupancy during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of safety protocols for in-situ visits to buildings during the pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Energy consumption variations due to lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouragement of telemedicine service instead of visiting clinics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Small health centers not attending covid-19 patients directly","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Historical average energy use decrease due to lockdown measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible waste patterns in energy use during diminished occupancy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of occupant presence and actions opa on total energy use in buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty and variations in energy consumption may not be considered in the eui estimation model, leading to discrepancies between estimated and actual values.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dissemination of covid-19 in built and social environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disregard of climate change by building stakeholders","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher ventilation
